page.title: 09The Church on Blackheath
page.content: The Rev. Henry Burgin,priest i/c All Saints Blackheath was questioned by pupils from the church school.He has been a priest for 10 yrs.Before he was an actor,opera singer & social worker. He is Chaplain to the Soc.of St. George. His church duties are to take baptisms,weddings,funerals,services & give advice.Often people come to the Heath,see the vicarage & knock to talk about their problems. 210 are on the electoral roll & about 120 take communion each Sunday.Most are comfortably off & the church pays its contribution to the diocese.Many think that it is "High" as it has candles,incense,images,robes,servers & a sung service.He doesnt think it matters as long as people turn to God & Christ & create a world of peace & love.The school cooperates with church & every contact benefits everyone.
